column4: i have ubuntu on my other machine, i install some plugins from ADD/REMOVE section, and now when i play a video files, it is unable to play it, and when i play the file with VLC player, it has a poor quality as compared to widnowsXP, anybody can tell me what is the default players and plugins (selected) in add/remove section? i want to restor it
i installed all the plugins available in add/remove section
